name: LIM (Blackthornprod Jam #3)
description:
Less is more...

The less clicks to clear the board, the more points in the final score. Too many clicks and...

This game is my participation to the third installment of the Blackthornprod game jam. I decided to go for a very (very very) simple puzzle game where the player must make the board's items disappear by clicking next to them. The goal is to minimize the number of click necessary.

I wanted to have a very limited gameplay to be able to work on the polish. The first version only contains a playable draft and I will try to consolidate it by adding the extra.

My goal is to be able to animate the items, make the screen more intuitive and relying less on text to convey the state of the game.

Any feedback welcome (and appreciated :-) )
